message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to hearing your response.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but I had a slightly lower budget in mind. Would you consider $1,050,000?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. To ensure we both achieve a satisfactory outcome, I propose a revised price of $1,150,000 for the product. This still represents a significant discount compared to our initial asking price and aligns more closely with the perceived value of the product to you. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
